entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
